customAbilities.text: Defend, but may only replace values of characters with the Spider-Man Family keyword

A named themed team may include Mona Lisa and is still a themed team if your force includes a character named Raphael.  UNIQUE MODIFIER - When adjacent to or attacking a character named Raphael, modify Mona Lisas attack value by +1
Mona Lisa can use Blades/Claws/Fangs, Flurry and Giant Reach: 2
Opposing characters within 3 squares can't use Stealth or Shape Change
Opposing characters combat values, except range, can't be modified when attacking Man-Thing Commander or being attacked by Man-Thing Commander
When an adjacent opposing character misses all targets of an attack, after resolutions deal it 1 penetrating damage.
When Man-Thing Commander uses it, modify damage +1 if the target has one or more action tokens
When Green Dragon Puff moves one or more times during an action, after resolutions she can use Force last at no cost.
FREE: Destroy an adjacent piece of blocking terrain.  If you do, generate and hold a light object, then make a Range Object attack.  Green Dragon Puff may activate this twice per turn.
Green Dragon Puff has Tiny instead of Colossal and can't use her trait.
When Green Dragon Puff moves one or more times during an action, after resolutions she can use Force Blast at no cost.
FREE:  Destroy an adjacent piece of blocking terrain.  If you do, generate and hold a light object, then make a Range Object attack.  Green Dragon Puff may activate this twice per turn
Green Dragon Puff has Tiny instead of Colossal and can't use her trait.
When Green Dragon Puff moves one or more times during an action, after resolutions she can use Force Blast at no cost
Green Dragon Puff has Tiny instead of Colossal and can't use her trait
Perplex, but only to target other characters.  When Beast uses it, if the target shares a keyword with him, you may instead modify the value except damage +2 or -2.
Extra Move Abilities

Once per force, when Ant-Man is KO'd, do not remove him from the game.  Instead, after resolutions, place him in the square he last occupied on his starting click.  He is now friendly to your opponent's force.
Slash can use Charge and run through blocking terrain
Extra move ability
Slash can use Close Combat Expert and Empower.  UNIQUE MODIFIER: Adjacent friendly characters named Raphael modify their attack and defense values by +1.
Once per turn, when an opposing character within 4 squares and line of fire makes an attack, give Thor an Evidence token.  FREE: Remove two Evidence tokens to make an attack.
At the beginning of the game choose one: Charge -or- Running Shot -or- Willpower and Empower.  Thor can use the chosen power(s) while this power is displayed.
Give Casey Jones a free action and choose Close Combat Expert or Range Combat Expert.  Casey can use the chosen power until you choose again.
When Leatherhead is adjacent to a friendly character named Michaelangelo, they both modify their attack +1.

Give Leatherhead an power action to move up to three spaces.  When actions resolve make a Close Attack that targets each opposing character occupying an adjacent space.  Hit characters are deal 2 damage and knocked back 2 spaces.
When Raphael hits an opposing character, after actions resolve you may place him in any space adjacent to that character
Raphael can use Flurry.  Not dealt penetrating damage when making a Close Attack
Michaelangelo can use Flurry.    Each times he hits an opposing character, after actions resolve you may give that character an action token.
When Michaelangelo hits an opposing character, after actions resolve you may place him in any space adjacent to that character.
When Raphael hits an opposing character, after actions resolve you may place him in any space adjacent to that character
Can use Blades.  If he missed a Close Attack this turn, he can use Sidestep.
When Donatello hits an opposing character, after actions resolve you may place him in any space adjacent to that character
All damage done by Donatello causes Knockback.  Giant Reach 2

customAbilities.action: All I Want is Palm Trees
customAbilities.text: If Slash occupies or is adjacent to printed hindering terrain, modify his attack value by -2
Slash can use Invulnerbility.  When Slash takes damage from an opponent's close attack, after actions resolve deal that character 1 penetrating damage.
When a character misses Black Widow with a Close Attack, after actions resolve give that character an action token.

customAbilities.action: Call In Help From the Spider-Verse
customAbilities.text: Once per turn for all characters with this trait, when Spider-Man hits an opposing character roll a d6 that cannot be re-rolled.  3 or 6 place a character with the Spider-Man family keyword adjacent to this character.

customAbilities.action: My Spider-Sense is Going Off Like Crazy
customAbilities.text: Spider-Man can use super senses.  When he does, increase the amount of his roll by 1 for every 100 points of the attacking characters cost.
When this character is healed by the X-Men team ability, modify its combat values except damage by +1 until your next turn.  Characters can only be modified by one effect of this name.
When this character is healed by the X-Men team ability, modify its combat values except damage by +1 until you next turn.  Characters can only be modified by one effect of this name
Give Nightcrawler a power action and place him in any square within line of fire.  If that square is within 4 squares of the space he began this action in, he may then make a Close Attack

customAbilities.action: I Built Him and I Have the Remote
customAbilities.text: At the beginning of you turn, you may remove an action token from Metalhead and vie and action token to an adjacent friendly character named Donatello
Lizard can use Regeneration and Toughness.  He can use Regeneration as a free action if he took 2 or more damage since your last turn from a single attack.
When Lizard takes damage from an attack, heal him 1 click.  When Lizard has 2 action tokens we can use Regeneration as a free action.

Rhino can use Charge.  When he does, he automatically breaks away and if he moves only in a straight horizontal, vertical or diagonal path and hits a character along that path, roll a d6; increase Rhino's damage value by half the result.
Batman's combat values can't be modified by other friendly characters
Can use Charge and Leap/Climb.  When he uses Charge, he can use Plasticity and he can use Charge normally or, he can be given a close combat action as a free action and then move.

customAbilities.action: Uh... What Was I Supposed to be Doing?
customAbilities.text: If a friendly character named Shredder is on the map, Rocksteady can use Willpower.  Friendly characters named Shredder or Bebop can use Empower but only to modify characters named Rocksteady.

Once per turn when Rocksteady misses an attack, put a Mutant Moron token on this card.  Give Rocksteady a free action and remove 2 Mutant Moron tokens to remove all action tokens from another friendly character that shares a keyword.
STOP, for the rest of the game, Bebop can't be healed.
Kraang can use Flurry and Sidestep
Before being given a move or close combat action, you may place Swamp Thing in any space of printed terrain within 4 squares.
Juggernaut ignores hindering terrain for movement purposes, and automatically breaks away.

At the beginning of the game, place a Helmet token on this card.  While that token is on this card, Juggernaut modifies his defense by +1 and can't be targeted by Incapacitation, Mind Control, and Penetrating/Psychic Blast.  When Juggernaut takes 3 damage from a single attack, remove that token.
